PageWidgetPortable.Title: Histórico
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_PD_STATUS.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>(A.HANDLETABELAORIGEM IN (SELECT B.HANDLE FROM Z_TABELAS B WHERE B.NOME = 'CP_ORDENSCOMPRA') AND A.HANDLEREGISTROORIGEM = @RASTRO(CP_ORDENSCOMPRA))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t1951_at2196_hs8b8677e9.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Notas fiscais>Efetivas
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_FN_DOCUMENTOS.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.ABRANGENCIA = 'R' AND A.HANDLE IN (SELECT B.DOCUMENTO FROM CM_ITENS B, CP_ORDENSCOMPRAITENS C WHERE B.ORDEMCOMPRAITEM = C.HANDLE AND C.ORDEMCOMPRA = @RASTRO(CP_ORDENSCOMPRA))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t1216_at3492_hsc9789e94.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Notas fiscais>Previsões
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_FN_DOCUMENTOS.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>(A.ABRANGENCIA = 'O') AND (A.HANDLE IN (SELECT B.DOCUMENTOFINANCEIRO FROM CP_ORDENSCOMPRAENTREGA B, CP_ORDENSCOMPRAITENS C, CP_ORDENSCOMPRA D WHERE B.ORDENSCOMPRAITENS = C.HANDLE AND C.ORDEMCOMPRA = D.HANDLE AND D.HANDLE = @RASTRO(CP_ORDENSCOMPRA)) OR A.HANDLE IN (SELECT D.DOCUMENTOFINANCEIRO FROM CP_ORDENSCOMPRA D WHERE D.HANDLE = @RASTRO(CP_ORDENSCOMPRA)))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t1216_at3491_hs52d523.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Ordem de compra de reposição
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_CP_ORDENSCOMPRA.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>(A.HANDLE IN (SELECT B.ORDEMCOMPRA FROM CP_ORDENSCOMPRAITENS B WHERE B.HANDLEOCORIGEM = @RASTRO(CP_ORDENSCOMPRA)))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t1529_at3787_hs29fd6602.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
